title: 3 Immediate Financial Steps to Take When Your Child is Born
subtitle: Set your child up for financial success from day one with these strategic actions to build wealth and credit.
content:
3 Immediate Financial Steps to Take When Your Child is Born

When your child is born, you need to do the following three things immediately:

1. Pay for Photos

Pay them $12,000 a year to be in photos on your family business's website. This not only acknowledges their role in the family business but also starts building a financial foundation.

2. Open a Custodial Roth IRA

Open a custodial Roth IRA for them and contribute $6,500 to it annually. This will allow their money to grow tax-free, giving them a significant advantage in building wealth for their future.

3. Add Them as an Authorized User

Enlist them as an authorized user on your credit card. They’ll likely have an impressive 800 credit score by the time they're 18, leading to better rates on loans and credit in the future.

All of these actions can ensure your child has $500,000 by the time they reach adulthood, simply for smiling at the camera and saying cheese. If that doesn’t teach them about how money works in this country, I don’t know what will.
